title: Coordinating Conjunctions (FANBOYS)
content: I wanted to go, [but|so] I was too tired. He likes pizza, [and|or] she likes pasta.
explanationEnUs: 'But' introduces contrast. 'And' adds information. 'So' shows result.
explanationZhTw: 'But' 引入對比。'And' 增加訊息。'So' 表示結果。
explanationZhCn: 'But' 引入对比。'And' 增加信息。'So' 表示结果。

title: Subordinating Conjunctions
content: [Because|Although] it was raining, we went for a walk. I will call you [when|while] I arrive.
explanationEnUs: 'Although' introduces a concession (difference from expectation). 'When' indicates a specific time.
explanationZhTw: 'Although' 引入讓步（與預期不同）。'When'以此特定時間。
explanationZhCn: 'Although' 引入让步（与预期不同）。'When'以此特定时间。

title: Correlative Conjunctions
content: [Both|Either] John and Mary are coming. You can have [either|neither] tea or coffee.
explanationZhTw: Both...and (兩者都)。Either...or (兩者之一)。Neither...nor (兩者皆非)。
explanationZhCn: Both...and (两者都)。Either...or (两者之一)。Neither...nor (两者皆非)。

title: Reason and Result
content: He studied hard, [consequently|because] he passed the test. He passed [because|so] he studied.
explanationEnUs: Conjunctions and connectors show the relationship between ideas.
explanationZhTw: 連詞和連接詞顯示想法之間的關係。
explanationZhCn: 连词和连接词显示想法之间的关系。

title: Time Connectors
content: Brush your teeth [before|after] you go to bed. Wash your hands [after|before] using the bathroom.
explanationZhTw: 使用 'before' 和 'after' 來排列事件順序。
explanationZhCn: 使用 'before' 和 'after' 来排列事件顺序。
